title: [K-12] Teaching Competency Assessment and Improvement Strategies in Virtual Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: For undergraduate science students, exploring competency assessments and improvement strategies to effectively adapt traditional face-to-face teaching methods to virtual environments.

learning_goals: Instructors' interaction strategies in virtual learning environments can be analyzed and three or more evaluation criteria proposed
Two or more efficient operational plans for VR/simulation-based classes can be designed through case studies
Colleagues' virtual teaching competencies can be evaluated on a 5-point scale using observational method tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
